resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108319</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108319</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204348</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching voice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Stimme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voix d'enseignement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Voz ensinando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Voce d'istruzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωνή διδασκαλίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Voz de enseñanza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson helps students to develop an effective voice by selecting words that are clear, concrete, and exact. Exercises are based on model sentences from world literature selections.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion hilft Kursteilnehmern, eine 
wirkungsvolle Stimme zu entwickeln, indem sie Wörter auswählt, die 
klar konkret sind, und fordern. Übungen basieren auf 
vorbildlichen Programmsätzen von den Weltliteraturanwählungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon aide des étudiants à développer une
voix pertinente par le choix des mots qui sont clairs, concrets, et 
exigent. Des exercices sont basés sur les phrases modèles des 
sélections de littérature du monde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição ajuda a estudantes desenvolver uma voz
eficaz selecionando as palavras que são desobstruídas, concretas, e 
exigem. Os exercícios são baseados nas sentenças modelo das 
seleções da literatura do mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione aiuta gli allievi a sviluppare una 
voce efficace selezionando le parole che sono chiare, concrete ed 
esigono. Le esercitazioni sono basate sulle frasi di modello 
dalle selezioni della letteratura del mondo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα βοηθά τους σπουδαστές για να αναπτύξει
μια αποτελεσματική φωνή με την επιλογή των λέξεων που είναι 
σαφείς, συγκεκριμένες, και εξαναγκάζουν. Οι ασκήσεις είναι 
βασισμένες στις πρότυπες προτάσεις από τις επιλογές παγκόσμιας 
λογοτεχνίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección ayuda a estudiantes a desarrollar una
voz eficaz seleccionando las palabras que son claras, concretas, y 
exigen. Los ejercicios se basan en las sentencias modelo de 
selecciones de la literatura del mundo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PAMELA BEAL
FN:PAMELA BEAL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204348</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108319</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/teaching-voice</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
